name: Vampire's Bane
description:
Controls: Mouse (left & right click for abilities) & arrows for movement.
Bottom left of the screen are three altars :
The doom altar allows you to spend blood to chage up and eventually cast the doom spell, winning the game.
The abilities altar allows you to buy new abilities.
The Altar of darkness allows you to restart the night, making the evil sun go away (be careful to use it regularly or you'll burn)

Once upon a time in the SoontobeDoomed Kingdom, a jester magical vampire wanted to make the sun disappear for two reasons: first because the sun burns, and second because it would be funny considering the name of the kingdom.

The other inhabitants, being boring people, wanted to stop him…
